author: J. Edward Moreno
title: Louisiana pastor who refuses to stop holding church services says 'true Christians' view death as a 'welcome friend'
description: A Louisiana pentecostal pastor who is refusing to abide by the state's "stay at home" order said "true Christians" see death as a "welcome friend."
content:
A Louisiana pentecostal pastor who is refusing to abide by the state's stay at home order said true Christians see death as a welcome friend.
Like any zealot or like any pure religious person, death looks to them like a welcome friend. True Christians do not… [+1370 chars]
